place:
(:action place_in_container; place the cookies or biscuits into an airtight container
    :parameters (?p - player ?cookies - cookies ?container - container)
    :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?cookies) (inventory ?p ?container) (not (in ?cookies ?container)))
    :effect (and (in ?cookies ?container) (not (on_plate ?cookies)) (not (on_tray ?cookies)))
)
separate:
(:action separate_using_paper; separate the cookies or biscuits using freezer paper, baking paper, or foil
    :parameters (?p - player ?cookies - cookies ?paper - paper)
    :precondition (and (in ?cookies ?container) (inventory ?p ?paper))
    :effect (and (separated ?cookies) (lined ?container))
)
freeze:
(:action freeze_biscuits; place the cookies or biscuits in the freezer
    :parameters (?p - player ?cookies - cookies ?freezer - freezer)
    :precondition (and (in ?cookies ?container) (separated ?cookies) (lined ?container))
    :effect (and (in_freezer ?cookies) (frozen ?cookies) (not (pliable ?cookies)) (hard ?cookies))
)

(:action thaw_cookies; thaw the frozen cookies or biscuits
    :parameters (?p - player ?cookies - cookies)
    :precondition (and (in_freezer ?cookies) (frozen ?cookies))
    :effect (and (not (in_freezer ?cookies)) (thawed ?cookies) (chewy ?cookies) (soft ?cookies))
)
```

This set of PDDL actions captures the steps and logic required to freeze baked cookies or biscuits, ensuring that each step is properly defined with preconditions and effects based on the provided entity states.
